section.title: About this Manual
section.para: This manual is about &MiKTeX;, a modern implementation of &TeXnFriends;.
If you are not yet familiar with using &TeX; (and Friends), then please consider reading one of the tutorials available on the Internet.

section.title: How to Get &MiKTeX;
section.para: The &MiKTeX; installer for &Windows; can be downloaded from the &MiKTeX; download page.
For other platforms (&macOS;, &Ubuntu) you can get &MiKTeX; via the system package manager frontend (&brew;, &aptget;). The &MiKTeX; download page has relevant information available.

section.title: Give Back
section.para: If you enjoy &MiKTeX; and want to support the project, then please become a known &MiKTeX; user by giving back something. It encourages me to continue, and is the perfect way to say thank you!

Visit the &MiKTeX; Give Back page, for more information.
